tool_description: Ebony data scraper is the easiest way to get access to products, prices, sales rank and data reviews from Amazon in JSON format
name: ebony-amazon-scraper
title: ebony-amazon-scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Search Results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebony-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search/MacBookAir"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebony-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ebony-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebony-amazon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
